attributes.action: Let the government confiscate properties from The Queen that truly belong to the state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we want to improve our state and help people achieve more, then we should start with the worst state scroungers that of the monarchy. Let us lead by example and take from them to set others free. Goodbye HM and welcome Mr and Mrs. Windsor.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
